overview: A young woman, ROSE DELONGPRE, yearns for acceptance from her mentally ill father while struggling to break free from her overprotective brother, whom she finds herself sexually attracted. Rose alone must cope with the aftermath of a murder, her rape, and her unborn son pleading to her from the womb. Add to this the beautiful SYMPHONY, spirit of the electronic arts, reminding us that this is just one of many voyeuristic fantasies made possible by the advent of digital cinema!
title: Rose & Alexander
